attributes.additional_details:
This a petition aimed at gaining voting privileges for 16-17 year olds before the next general election.  As a politically active young person, I believe the law that restricts young people in having their say in politics and how our country is run, is not only outdated, but stifles our freedom of choice in who runs the United Kingdom.

We are the generation of tomorrow and the youth of today. We are the one's who shape our future, not the privileged politicians of Westminster. Let us have a say before the 2015 General Election.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Lower the UK franchise to 16 year's of age

Created by: Rudi Affolter

Closing: 30/03/2015
